Title: Knocking on the Door
Description:
Now, onward to the Stormstout Brewery! It's high time that I was reunited with the rest of the Stormstouts... and what better way to reunite than over a few mugs of ale?

You know where the brewery is, right? Just follow this road to the west. You can't miss it. Of course, you're free to share the road with us - we'll be leaving any moment now.
ObjectivesText: Meet up with Chen Stormstout at the entrance of the Stormstout Brewery.
